caption.p:
Table 1: effect of aqueous extract of Caralluma europaea against carbon tetrachloride-induced hepatotoxicity-related parameters in rats. Values are expressed as mean ± SEM ( n = 6). Data were analyzed by one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's test. p
∗∗ < 0.01 when compared to the normal control group; p
∗∗∗ < 0.001 when compared to the normal control group. p # < 0.05 when compared to the CCl 4 group; p ## < 0.01 when compared to the CCl 4 group; and p ### < 0.001 when compared to the CCl 4 group. Ns = not significant when compared to CCl 4 + silymarin group; p †† <0.01 when compared to CCl 4 + silymarin group.
Click here for additional data file.
